add $t0, $t1, $t2     <---00000001001010100100000000100000
sub $t0, $t1, $t2     <---00000001001010100100000000100010
addi $t0, $t1, 1     <---00100001001010000000000000000001
lw $t0, 4($t1)     <---10001101001010000000000000000100
sw $t0, -4($t1)     <---10101101001010001111111111111100
beq $t0, $t1, 500     <---00010001000010010000000111110100
bne $t0, $t1, 500     <---00010101000010010000000111110100
jal 4000     <---00001100000000000000111110100000
jr $ra     <---00000011111000000000000000001000
slt $t0, $t1, $t2     <---00000001001010100100000000101010
